meta_description.title: Myst Journey - A complete guide to the entire Myst series
meta_description.text: MystJourney.com is a complete guide to the Myst video game series. The Myst games are about exploration, reflection, mystery, and puzzle-solving.

people_also_ask.question: Can you still play Myst?
people_also_ask.heading: There are already a couple different versions of the classic adventure puzzler Myst out there. You can still play 1999's Myst Masterpiece Edition, or the updated version of that version, realMyst: Masterpiece Edition, from 2014.16-Sep-2020
people_also_ask.title: Myst is coming back again, this time 'reimagined' and playable ...

people_also_ask.question: Is Myst 2021 a remake?
people_also_ask.heading: The 2021 remake of “Myst” changes little aside from enhanced graphics, audio and controls, a testament to the timeless game design. (Cyan Inc.) Mead-based Cyan Inc.'s ability to tell stories through the environment itself was revolutionary in 1993 and is still impressive today.02-Sep-2021
people_also_ask.title: Game On: 'Myst,' one of history's most important games, is ...

people_also_ask.question: Is there a modern version of Myst?
people_also_ask.heading: Designed and built from the ground up in Unreal Engine, this newly-reimagined version of Myst includes fresh takes on the visuals in every area in the game. With both VR and 2D play experiences in mind, this definitive, modern edition of Myst will immerse you in the world in a way that has never been possible before.

knowledge_panel.description: myst is a graphic adventure puzzle video game designed by the miller brothers, robyn and rand. it was developed by cyan, inc., published by broderbund, and initially released for the macintosh personal computer platform in 1993. in the game, players travel via a special book to the island of myst. wikipedia
